attributes.action: put a stop to the planned march by Islam4UK through Wooton Bassett!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK government should be doing all it can to stop the proposed march by Islam4UK through the town of Wooton Bassett. 

The highway for heroes & wonderful people of Wooton Bassett do not deserve this march to happen.

This group can march anywhere it wishes in the country but have chosen Wooton Bassett to cause outrage & offence.

Islam4UK is an extremists Islamic group and does not represent the Muslim community in this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
